remarks: Lemma for ~ cxpaddle .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Aug-2014.)
statement:
cxpaddlelem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cxpaddlelem.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
cxpaddlelem.3 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ 1 ) $.
cxpaddlelem.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
cxpaddlelem.5 $e |- ( ph -> B <_ 1 ) $.
cxpaddlelem $p |- ( ph -> A <_ ( A ^c B ) ) $.
